Articles.Content:
So I managed to make an SSTO guys! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) ........... well kind of. It's just a gigantic freaking rocket that kind of forces it's way into space without much class. 

I give you the Jumbo!

![4ougaBI.png](http://i.imgur.com/4ougaBI.png)

It has 40 Nuke engines, 4 Rhinos, and ***6*** Mammoth engines!

![dlNPYlR.png](http://i.imgur.com/dlNPYlR.png)

![kixI28e.png](http://i.imgur.com/kixI28e.png)

![fTWadWO.png](http://i.imgur.com/fTWadWO.png)

![VHluOD4.png](http://i.imgur.com/VHluOD4.png)

As you can see by the album most of the Nukes exploded. Pilot negligence, I suppose >.>

I'll post a link for download if anyone is interested.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T03:29:00Z" title="05/01/2015 03:29  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by Chozo Nomad**
Looks more like a first stage rocket with a cockpit slapped to it. The innovations of kerbal engineers XD

> 
> Looks more like a first stage rocket with a cockpit slapped to it. The innovations of kerbal engineers XD

But of course! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
